divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 6pm on the 17th of June 2007 I was golfing in my neighbours yard when about ten people on the other side of the yard pointed out a shinny black matalic object hovering at an altitude of about 750-1000ft. When i saw the object it was very close almost directly overhead and i could see most of its details. It had no visable openings and no contrail behind it also it didn't make a sound. At first the object started moving to my left a picked up speed and then abrutbly turned around and went in the other direction. At this time i ran back to my house to get my camera and by the time i got back it was gone. I asked the peope who saw it were it went and they said it just vaniahed into thin air. A couple of minutes later the police came up and asked us what we saw. Also the obect appered to "wobble"at low speed but gained stablity wehen i picked up speed.
Summary: shiny black oject hovering overhead an altitude of about 750-1000ft.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Sydney
There were no other sightings in Sydney on or around June 17th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
